ValidationRule.description: Automatically lock an Opportunity record from editing once the stage has changed to 'closed won'
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND(ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(StageName ), 'Closed Won'), NOT(RecordType.DeveloperName='NSSales_609_1')), TRUE, FALSE)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Closed Won opportunities cannot be edited.
